eventName: Come Catastrophes or Wakes of Vultures
storyInfo: As the weather becomes colder, the citizens' resentment towards the bank continues to swell, and more and more people start to gather in front of it.

attributes.content: Did we really need to be here so early? There's nobody outside the bank right now.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I have some mint candy, if that'll perk you up.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Appreciate it, but I don't think that's going to do the trick. C'mere, Teacher's Pet. Gimme a good pinch.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Tch...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Ow!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Now, let's get to work. Rise and shine, my friends! Hey, I'm talking to you!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: *yaaaawn*... Oh, sorry about that, Franka.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Squad Member

attributes.content: Alright, listen up.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: The bank has a total of four exits. Beanie, take your four people with you and guard the rear door.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: Blacksteel Squad Member

attributes.content: Copperplate, you and Coins will head to the garage door.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: Blacksteel Squad Member

attributes.content: Everyone else, come with the three of us and stay at the front door.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... Excuse me, ma'am. I'd like to ask you something...
attributes.name: Unhappy-looking Resident

attributes.content: Will you people be out here all day?
attributes.name: Unhappy-looking Resident

attributes.content: Er, yes, we will. But we're simply handling some business and don't intend to interfere your daily affairs.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Handling business? A few days ago, I signed my pioneering agreement right here. That's the last bit of business I'll be handling.
attributes.name: Unhappy-looking Resident

attributes.content: Who are you...?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hmm... I should at least fill out their customer service review.
attributes.name: Unhappy-looking Resident

attributes.content: (Checks the thumbs up)
attributes.name: Unhappy-looking Resident

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Unhappy-looking Resident

attributes.content: This bullet... Were you the one who asked Jessica to bring it?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Mm. Found it in an antiques shop in Victoria, a few years back.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: No wonder you searched all over the camp but couldn't find it back then. By the looks of it, seems like one of the officers secretly brought the gun into Victoria.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: And now that the gun's missing, that bullet is the last artifact he left behind.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: I warned the fella not to engrave all that flowery nonsense on it... In any case, why didn't you hold onto the bullet yourself?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Because you're the one who should have it, not me.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: What, your ghosts finally catching up to you?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: We were friends once, at least. I can't say I'm happy things ended up like this.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: And do those feelings of guilt and sorrow do you any good?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: What are you after, Woody?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Call your men back, and stop driving out the residents.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Even if Blacksteel pulls out, the government's just going to hire some other mercenaries. It won't change the outcome.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: I heard you initially had the option to turn down the commission. Am I wrong?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Despite its name, at the end of the day Blacksteel Worldwide is still based in Columbia. We don't have the right to refuse a job from the government.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: I see, so even you have to tuck your tail between your legs like a normal person from time to time.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Times have changed. As far as the Columbian government is concerned, soldiers like us mean nothing compared to the geniuses in Trimounts.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Tell me, bossman, what does Blacksteel stand to gain in this contract between the bank and the government?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: This isn't a long-term arrangement, Woody.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: The government has a job for us, so we follow orders and get paid. Beyond that... I don't particularly care, nor am I allowed to care.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: I remember back in Laterano. You'd always tell me about all sorts of things, from minor tensions between different groups to massive conflicts between countries... And you'd always put it in the context of how much the people would suffer.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: That was a long time ago. I can hardly remember at this point.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: But I do, clear as day. You told me this on our way from the library to the student dorms: the strong protect themselves, but the truly great protect others.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: So why is it that now, after you've seen these people with your own eyes, you can say you don't care because you're not allowed to?
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: We've both gotten old, Woody. There's a limit to how many things you can care about.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: True enough. But even so, there ain't that many things worth caring about... Everything that's left, that's what's important.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: Maybe I can't protect everyone on the plate anymore, with these rickety old bones. But, the people around me... I'd give my life for them.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: I swear—if any of them get hurt because you got involved, then so help me God I will return this bullet to you. In one piece.
attributes.name: Woodrow

attributes.content: ...I sincerely hope it doesn't come to that.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Captain, more and more people are showing up... Do we need to set up a blockade?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: We're not at that point yet. We don't know what the crowd's intentions are, and acting rashly will only make it harder to keep things under control. If dialogue is an option, I'd like to negotiate with the organizer first.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But... from what I can tell, people have been trickling in since morning. I don't think they're organized.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Nobody's armed, so I'm not too worried about it coming to violence. But, you know, not not worried...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: After all, the pressure isn't coming from the crowd in front of us, but rather from what's behind us.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: The three of them turn their heads and look back at the bank's bright and pristine glass doors and windows.
The sturdiness of the windows blocks out the darkness from the outside, as well as the cold and melting snow.
But no matter how transparent the glass panels are, the warmth and brightness inside will never spill out past the door.
Captain, take a look at her...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Helena...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Most of them have already signed the pioneering agreement, so what are they all doing, gathering out there?
attributes.name: Worried Bank Employee

attributes.content: What are you worried about? Those aren't toys the Blacksteel people are holding, you know.
attributes.name: Indifferent Bank Employee

attributes.content: *sigh* Good grief... And I already turned the TV on to watch the special New Year's interview. I can't imagine what the Governor's going to talk about this year.
attributes.name: Worried Bank Employee

attributes.content: Isn't it the same old song and dance, no matter how they try to spin it?
attributes.name: Indifferent Bank Employee

attributes.content: Hello, everyone. First, I'd like to wish everyone a happy New Year on behalf of everyone on the broadcasting team.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: During this program, we will be interviewing the Governor and asking him a variety of questions on the issues our citizens are most concerned about. I'm glad you could join us today, Governor.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: Hello there.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: Just as a routine reminder for our viewers: this program was pre-filmed in September, and the situation may have changed since the time of recording. Please keep this in mind.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: You only have the scientists perched up in Trimounts to blame for that. Because they still haven't worked out a way to get a Messenger all around Columbia in a single day, hahaha.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: Helena, it's so cold out here today. Why are you—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I appreciate the thought, but I ain't budging an inch.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I know that you have your issues with the bank... If you have any demands, I might be able to pass them along for you.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No need to be so uptight, Captain Liskarm.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Most of us here already signed a pioneering contract, and will be leaving with the next convoy. As for what we want...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: There's nothing left. We're sick and tired of these stupid games, and we're not going to do it anymore.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Then what's the point of you all coming here?
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: To take a look.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: At what?
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Ever since I was little, I was always told that when you say goodbye to something that's been with you for a long time, you take one good long last look.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: So far... I took a good long look at my diner, at the mining plant, at every last place here on this plate.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: And today, on the first day of the new year, I'm here to take a good long look at the culprit that's making me say goodbye to everything I've ever known.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Ms. Helena, I'm loathe to remind you of this fact, but you voluntarily signed every one of those mortgage agreements yourself.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: You're right, I sure did. We walked this path together, but you also pushed us down it.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Nonsense. Take that other gentleman, for example. I seem to recall his business taking a major setback, and no one else would provide a loan. We were gracious enough to lend him forty thousand certs.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Right. At first, it was just forty thousand. Not too massive, but not pocket change either. All I wanted was to pay it off as soon as I could.
attributes.name: Furious Resident

attributes.content: But then you people said I had to properly plan out my investments and liabilities. You said I shouldn't pay everything off in one lump sum along with the interest. You gave me preferential installment rates, and told me to use the leftover money to buy your other financial products...
attributes.name: Furious Resident

attributes.content: Right. What you lent me was forty thousand, but what you took from me was my store, my house, my car, and even my whole family!
attributes.name: Furious Resident

attributes.content: We all believed your propaganda and lies at first.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: You said you'd make our lives prosperous, and help us achieve a better future. But where do us customers sit at the table of your so-called better future?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Right. We were fools blinded by our greed and short-sightedness. We all wanted that little extra something out of life, so we snapped at the bait.
attributes.name: Furious Resident

attributes.content: But, why did we do that? Why was every last person on this plate so desperate, so eager to bite into that life-threatening hook, like a school of hungry fins?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Is it really our fault? Or has the well been poisoned this whole time–
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Miss Liskarm, please have these people vacated within ten minutes.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Make it quick.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: (*whispers*) Jessica! Find a way to call up Mr. Cliff! Hurry!
attributes.name: Liskarm
Jessica
attributes.content: On it...

attributes.name: Jessica
attributes.content: No good. I can't get through at all.
Keep trying.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No. Sorry, Captain, I need to tell him what's happening here, face-to-face.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...Then hurry.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Now then... Helena, Jessica's gone to report the situation to upper management. In just a little while—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You ever given any thought to your own future?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I... I've always wanted to start a security company of my own.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Would you take out a loan for it?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hypothetically, if I had to. Because that's my dream.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Then you better darn well be careful. That stack of cash only represents the future. It ain't gonna take you there.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: That's the painful lesson the guys you're protecting taught us firsthand.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: They're liars and thieves. They tamper with the street signs, then turn around and laugh at us for hurtling down dangerous roads in the dark of the night.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I... I understand. I really do.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Mr. Governor, let's dive straight into the key issues. As we all know, there are still a number of areas in the transitional phase between frontier settlement and fully-developed zone—
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: Most of these settlements in the region are pioneer plates with decades of history and their own core industries, but don't yet meet the standard to be considered nomadic cities. Correct?
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: It's just as you say. I've heard that the state government is currently grappling with the question of how to dispose of these plates.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: Nomadic plates are an important strategic resource, so I cannot agree with your use of the word 'dispose.' Providing assistance to these transitional areas and their residents has become one of the most important items on our desk.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: For example, additional investment, tax exemptions, school admission discounts, and low-interest loans... All of these policies are designed to benefit people living in just those situations.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: Manager...
attributes.name: Worried Bank Employee

attributes.content: Fetch the authorization agreement. The one sent by the state government that allows us to mobilize private armed forces in case of emergency.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Worried Bank Employee

attributes.content: Hurry it up. Don't just sit there gawking.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Decades ago, when our forefathers came here, the Columbian customs officials asked about their dreams.
attributes.name: Agitated Resident

attributes.content: Later, when development on the plate was booming, you encouraged us to stride forward towards a brighter tomorrow. Saying that all of Columbia wanted to hear our enthusiasm.
attributes.name: Agitated Resident

attributes.content: But now that we're destitute, sickly, and worthless, you're slamming the door in our faces.
attributes.name: Agitated Resident

attributes.content: That's not how this works! We'll holler, we'll shout, and we'll roar!
attributes.name: Agitated Resident

attributes.content: So you'd best prick up your ears and listen!
attributes.name: Agitated Resident

attributes.content: We cry out for a blizzard, and a mighty storm comes♪
attributes.name: Agitated Resident

attributes.content: Pushed out in the wilds, with hardly a crumb♪
attributes.name: Agitated Resident

attributes.content: Far, far away, from the lands where we've grown♪
attributes.name: Agitated Resident

attributes.content: Searching for new lands, new soil to call home♪
attributes.name: Agitated Resident

attributes.content: About these low-interest loans...
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: Did I catch you on the back foot? How unusual. Normally, you'd be bombarding me with questions.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: To be honest, I think this is a rather tough question, and hope that you'll answer it truthfully.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: Some believe that providing a deferment on the interest is simply using tax money to subsidize the local economy. Which is not only a waste of money, but also dampens the enthusiasm of the residents and promotes laziness over self-reliance.
attributes.name: Host

attributes.content: Speaking from the state's perspective, we have identified specific plates where something similar can be observed, but we must also extend an appeal to our other citizens. Please show patience and wait for our projects in the transitional zones to fully come to fruition.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: I implore you to have faith that our local residents aren't lazy, but simply need time to rediscover how to use their legs to walk again.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: The day they're strong enough to cast aside their crutches, they will repay our Columbian brothers and sisters back in full, with their hearts full of gratitude for your generosity.
attributes.name: Interview Guest

attributes.content: Found it!
attributes.name: Worried Bank Employee

attributes.content: Go and close the windows. Draw the curtains tight, and stay away from doors and windows.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: What are they doing outside... Singing?
attributes.name: Worried Bank Employee

attributes.content: The plow trudges on, the hammer strikes true♪
attributes.name: Plate Resident

attributes.content: With our own two hands, there's nothing we can't do♪
attributes.name: Plate Resident

attributes.content: Ever since the day we were born♪
attributes.name: Plate Resident

attributes.content: A heavy burden we've always worn♪
attributes.name: Plate Resident

attributes.content: Your ten minutes are up. Seeing how they still refuse to vacate the premises, we'll have to resort to more forceful measures.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Sorry, ma'am, but we can't do that.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...We shouldn't let these sorts of things get between our partnership.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: If you insist on neglecting your duties, then I can only regretfully inform you that your team is now under my direct command.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Who the hell do you think you are–
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: The agreement to reclaim this plate was jointly signed by the local government, the bank, and Blacksteel. There are clauses within it stating that Blacksteel's personnel must obey our commands and mobilize in case of extraordinary circumstances.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: This is an authorization letter sent at the time of the signing. Please take a look.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: You do not have the authority to override our actions, ma'am.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No, it says it right here in no uncertain terms. I DO have that authority.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Now, Miss Liskarm. Do it.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Apologies, but I'll have to kindly refuse.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: What you are 'refusing' is not a minor request from a small bank, but a direct order from the government.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Don't forget – Blacksteel is only what it is today because of the trust that Columbia has poured into it.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: But... trust is easily broken. Even a tiny breach is enough to tear down everything that's been built up.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Ha.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Do it. Do not make me repeat myself.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: We're the ones who starve, we're the ones who die♪
attributes.name: Plate Resident

attributes.content: For a null and empty check, we paid the final price♪
attributes.name: Plate Resident

attributes.content: We're not in that future, my oh my oh my♪
attributes.name: Plate Resident

attributes.content: Goodbye, my sweet home, a good long goodbye♪
attributes.name: Plate Resident

attributes.content: Now far, far away, from the lands where we've grown♪
attributes.name: Plate Resident

attributes.content: Still searching for new lands, new soil to call home♪
attributes.name: Plate Resident

attributes.content: Ma'am, it makes no difference how many times you say it.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm not going to open fire.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Let me say this again – I will not open fire, nor will I allow any of my squad members to do so.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: My job is simply to ensure that nobody breaks into the bank and threatens your precious lives.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: And as far as I can tell, these people pose no threat to you, and merely wish to say goodbye.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: My sincerest condolences if your fragile heart is wounded by this.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: After all... Parting is always such sweet sorrow. Isn't that right?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Listen up, everyone. Nobody is allowed to move without my direct order.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Roger...
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: R-Roger...
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Now, turn around, ma'am. This is what it truly means to sing. So just sit back and enjoy the show.
attributes.name: Franka
